data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Pedernales to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pedernales, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 21,200 people living in Pedernales.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,298 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Pedernales, Dominican Republic to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Japanese people. Make the Japanese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Pedernales, Dominican Republic to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 21,200 souls living in the state of Pedernales with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.section_summary:
the state of Pedernales, Dominican Republic has a population of 21,200.

We estimate Pedernales has 2,298 people who might know Jesus, 17,586 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,316 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Pedernales, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
